ygData.subject: Re: Fletching?
ygData.msgSnippet: Grobb has most of the components you need for arrows and bows. The one thing i heard was missing was the parabolic fletch, which you dont have to worry about
ygData.messageBody:
Grobb has most of the components you need for arrows and bows.
The one thing i heard was missing was the parabolic fletch, which you
dont have to worry about until you reach your cap with the first 4
easiest components, then reach you cap after upgrading to the medium
nock.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule

--- "Catherine M. Campbell" <cathyc@...> wrote:
> From: "Catherine M. Campbell" <cathyc@...>
>
> My DE shadowknight is trying to decide if it is
> possible at all to take up
> fletching. She was able to get a hickory bow from
> the Bleek Fletcher in
> Neriak, and there is a fletching kit there, but only
> one of the components
> for making arrows.
>
> My question is -- does anyone know where the dark
> races can get all of the
> components required? Naela is currently in Ogguk.
>
> Any and all help gratefully appreciated.
> Naela
>
